meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Read the Terms of Service for using the Divo healthcare platform

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Divo, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Divo provides a platform for scheduling medical appointments, managing healthcare records, and facilitating communication between patients and healthcare providers.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
list: Maintain the security of your account
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Respect the privacy and rights of others

privacy.title: 4. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your use of Divo is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of Divo, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of Divo and are protected by U.S. and international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Divo shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the platform.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at
